column5: Man did that fly by fast ! Due to family commitments I was unable to make it up for the weekend but couldn't let the event pass by with a no show so I headed up during the week to get in a couple of days with the gang.  Wednesday afternoon Kevin invited Don, Chuck and myself to have a look at the walleye pond that so many of us have heard about .    Quite the ingenious setup.    Wednesday evening I headed out with Shelley and Chuck (ladywalleye & bigchevy4x4) for some west arm walleye, the fishing gods smiled on us and we were rewarded with several fish, four of which were invited to breakfast the next morning.  Here's ladywalleye working her culinary magic.    Mmmmm, walleye !!    Here's a shot of Tent City before the masses arrived on friday.    Biteme and his buddy came up wednesday night and decided to visit campsites instead of fishing, those that have been to Lakair before can appreciate this, this is my third year and I fish less every year. lol Their plan was to get a good nights sleep and hit it hard in the morning. I believe the exact words were, " WE're gonna hit it hard tomorrow, all day !! You're making the sandwhiches !!  I don't know what was in those sandwiches but ....    Here's a sunset shot that looks right out of "Lord of the Rings"    Well the fishing was good and the company even better, can't wait till next year.
Glad you had a good time Graham, sorry I didn't get a chance to sit and chat with you....maybe next year...  .Maureen
Good to hear you had a good time Graham!  Whopper
Great pics Graham, thanks for sharing.  All these Lakair reports are getting the juices flowing.  Can't wait till August when I head up there.
Hey Graham it was great meeting you Great report hope to see you next year!!
It was nice seeing you again.. short visits are Best!!  LOL.. JK..
Great too see you again Graham.  next time hopefully we will get more time to head out fishing together  LeXX
It sure looks like everyone had so much fun & good times & great food  ,i wish i was there,thanks for sharing.nice report   cheers

Hey Graham.......just got done unpacking.....What a great time.....was great seeing you and everyone again and thx again for that SPECIAL jig....lol....it worked the magic a few more times this week.....TC and can't wait till next year......Chuck and Shelley.....

Hey Graham, as Chuck said... thanks for the magic lure... lets hang around for the TIE breaker next time...I caught up to you quick with it... I bet I could have out fished you with YOUR lure....   hhehehhe (NO... you can't have it back..lol)  Great to have seen you, we enjoyed your company and fishing with you in your boat.. .so much more room.. thanks for taking us out....  Don't forget to head on up to Simcoe sometime... We'd be glad to show you the waters...
Great seeing you again Graham.. next time we can get to talk some more
